ball-drop.description: Join the party and enjoy an all-inclusive 5-course gourmet dinner, premium open bar, dancing on two floors, festivities, and a view of bustling Times Square. Dance the night away and just before midnight, step out to our cordoned off sidewalk to experience the electrifying atmosphere of the crowd, join in the Times Square Ball Drop Count Down, and welcome in the New Year!

our-services.broadcast.description: A versatile space with easy loading and unloading, natural light or black out, full catering, and 24 hour Access.
our-services.corporate.description: An ideal venue for early morning breakfasts, lunch meetings, corporate dinners, full day conferences, holiday parties, and galas - the Manhattan Manor is a full service catering facility located in the center of midtown with easy access to all public transportation.
our-services.fashion.description: Whether you're hosting a fashion show or need a unique event space to show your collection, the Manhattan Manor is available for all types of special events with full catering service.
our-services.film-and-photo.description: A clean open space with easy loading and unloading, city views, natural light or black out, full catering, and 24 hour access.
our-services.galas-and-fundraisings.desc: Two magnificent venues to host your important events in the heart of Manhattan. Impressive views, central location, flexible use of both spaces, full catering and exceptional service to host elegant events.
our-services.meetings-conferences.descri: An ideal venue for early morning breakfasts, lunch meetings, corporate dinners, full day conferences, holiday parties, and galas - the Manhattan Manor is a full service catering facility located in the center of midtown with easy access to all public transportation.
our-services.mitzvah.description: A fun flexible space, the Manhattan Manor offers ease, convenience and a true New York Experience. Steps from Times Square kids and adults alike will walk into the magical Skylight Room bedecked with all of the stellar activities and food to make it a fun, memorable day for all.
our-services.not-for-profit.description: Two perfect venues to host special guests for important conferences or meetings as well as an elegant gala to celebrate your accomplishments. Full service catering to meet your needs.
our-services.product-launches.descriptio: Product launch events are essential for any business. Our venues offer the perfect backdrop just steps from all major subways and trains. Our staff is there to assist in your achieving the specific purpose of creating awareness and publicity for your particular product/brand.
our-services.special-productions.descrip: A versatile open space in a central, convenient location with easy street access, natural light or black out, 24- hour access, and full catering.
our-services.sweet-16s.description: A fun flexible space, the Manhattan Manor offers ease, convenience and a true New York Experience. Steps from Times Square kids and adults alike will walk into the magical Skylight Room bedecked with all of the stellar activities and food to make it a fun, memorable day for all.
our-services.wedding.description: Two magnificent venues to celebrate your special day! Guests will bask in natural light during the ceremony streaming through the skylights, then enjoy cocktails in the elegant Manhattan Club, followed by a memorable reception in the brand new Skylight Room with its exposed brick and magnificent chandeliers. A full service catering facility with you as our only focus.
our-team.description: We look forward to welcoming you for this festive celebration!
venues.description: Rosie O'Grady's and Manhattan Manor feature interconnected rooms, allowing guests to move freely throughout the venue. Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis—we cannot guarantee seating in a specific room, but we will do our best to accommodate your preferences.
who-we-are.description: The Legendary Rosie O'Grady's Steak & Seafood Restaurant, established in 1974 and just steps from Times Square and Rockefeller Center, is an independent steakhouse and casual eatery located in one of the newest, most modern spaces in New York. With two bars, an expansive dining room, and private event spaces, it's the perfect place to ring in the New Year!
waiting-list-form.successs-message: Thank you for joining our waiting list. We will contact you if tickets become available.
party-menu-tickets.description:
Rosie O'Grady's and Manhattan Manor's New Year's Eve Celebration is the ultimate way to experience the Times Square Ball Drop Count Down without the long wait on the street!

Join us for a stylish all-inclusive party featuring a gourmet dinner, premium open bar, dancing to DJ Rhythm In Motion, and a live performance by the duo “Acute Inflections” If you prefer, choose our Bar package for a fantastic party experience without the dinner!

Indulge in great food and drinks, dance the night away, and just before midnight, step out to our exclusive, cordoned-off sidewalk to soak in the electrifying atmosphere and join the Countdown to welcome the New Year in the greatest city in the world!
gift-cards.description: Give the Perfect Gift to your family, friends and colleagues
the-restaurant.description:
Six unique spaces that are unique, versatile, and lend themselves to all types of events. Ehether you are hosting an all-day conference, business dinner, networking event, or special family celebration, Manhattan Manor is the place.
Join us at Rosie O'Grady's Steak & Seafood House starting at 9 pm for five hours of Premium Open Bar, a Five Course Gourmet Dinner, and Music & Dancing!! Celebrate all night with a fun crowd and just before midnight, step out onto our cordoned off sidewalk and join in the Times Square Ball Drop Count Down.
rosie-pub-broadway-room.description: Enjoy a casual evening before or after a theatrical show in Rosie's Pub located on our lower level. We offer a lighter menu of appetizers, sandwiches, and traditional favorites. Our enchanting Broadway Ballroom is private, complete with fireplace and satellite bar, accommodating up to 70 guests for either a sit-down dinner or cocktails. The space can be expanded by joining the adjacent Pub to accommodate more than 90 guests.
private-event: Host a Private Event at Rosie O'Grady's or Manhattan Manor
tickets.children.description: Child (Under 12 years) each ticket. Accompanying dinner ticket only - not at bar
entertainment.description:
What better way to spend a fun New Year's Eve than with three amazing New York entertainers.

The duo Acute Inflections' music and melody has been filling the hearts of audiences in venues all over the city (and world)!

Rhythm in Motion DJ team is renowned for their mix up traditional, original, and perfectly picked tunes that draw people on to the dance floor and party all night long.

LA Photo Party is a modern take on the classic photo booth experience; offering a range of classic to cutting-edge services that connect brands to their audiences.
